gate.metamap

Class MetaMapPR

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.util.AbstractFeatureBearer
      • gate.creole.AbstractResource
        • gate.creole.AbstractProcessingResource
          • gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser
            • gate.metamap.MetaMapPR
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.creole.ANNIEConstants, gate.Executable, gate.LanguageAnalyser, gate.ProcessingResource, gate.Resource, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.util.NameBearer, Serializable

    @CreoleResource(name="MetaMap Annotator",
                helpURL="http://gate.ac.uk/userguide/sec:misc-creole:metamap",
                comment="This plugin uses the MetaMap Java API to send GATE document content to MetaMap skrmedpostctl server and PrologBeans mmserver instances running on the given machine/port")
public class MetaMapPR
extends gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser
implements gate.ProcessingResource, Serializable
    This class is the implementation of the resource METAMAP.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • stripDeterminers

        public String stripDeterminers(gate.AnnotationSet inputAS,
                      gate.Annotation ann,
                      String annContent,
                      AnnotNormalizeMode mode)
        Parameters:
        ann - Annotation to be classified by MetaMap
        annContent - Annotation content or user-defined feature value
        mode - Mode to determine whether to strip just leading determiner or all determiners in the content
        Returns:
        Annotation content with leading or all determiners stripped. E.g. his hypertension -> hypertension, disease of the nervous system -> disease of nervous system

                         throws gate.creole.ExecutionException
        Requires Tokenizer and POS tagger to have been run on text
        Parameters:
        termMapById - HashMap containing first occurrence of each of term
        inputAS - input AnnotationSet
        outputAS - output AnnotationSet
        Throws:
        gate.creole.ExecutionException

      • processEvents

        public void processEvents(List<gov.nih.nlm.nls.metamap.Ev> eVList,
                 List<gov.nih.nlm.nls.metamap.Negation> negList,
                 String type,
                 Long lngInitialOffset,
                 Long lngEndOffset)
                   throws Exception
        Parameters:
        eVList - - list of events returned by MetaMap
        negList - - list of negated terms returned by MetaMap
        type - - Candidate or Mapping
        lngInitialOffset - - offset start of annotation relative to prior text
        lngEndOffset - - use existing annotation end if annotating feature inside annotation
        Throws:
        Exception

        Returns:
